jetbrains_java_error_heap_dump.description: Java error heap dump of JetBrains tools. Can be several gigabytes.

jetbrains_java_error_logs.description: Java error logs for various JetBrains tools.

gradio_temporary_files.description: User temporary files for Gradio UI. Gradio is a Python UI library used by many AI applications.

wslg_rd_client_auto_trace.description: WSLg (Windows Subsystem for Linux GUI) remote desktop client auto trace logs. Can be generated when using Docker. Can be dozens of gigabytes.

delphi_linecse_server_log.description: Delphi IDE licensing server logs. Contains sensitive information, like Serial Number and Registration Key in plain text.

delphi_license_server_log_2.description: Delphi licensing server logs. Contains information on Delphi and Licensing Service locations.
